name: Extension States(-,*,+) Colored - [Ext]EOM - Fx 7+
description:
For Firefox 7+ and latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds.

This style colors '[Ext]Extension Options Menu' 1.24 extension state symbols: Orange(-) and Red(*) and Green(+): https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/extension-options-menu/versions/

Tested on Firefox 7+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds.

Credit for code goes to:

User Chris000001 on: http://forums.mozillazine.org/

To customize or fix Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds, you can also have a look at my other styles: user 61655
